original_text: But you are to seek the place the Lord your God will choose from among all your tribes to put his Name there for his dwelling. To that place you must go;
korean_text: 오직 너희의 하나님 여호와께서 자기의 이름을 두시려고 너희 모든 지파 중에서 택하신 곳인 그 계실 곳으로 찾아 나아가서

sentences.original_text: But you are to seek the place
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 당신은 그 장소를 찾아야 합니다

sentences.original_text: the Lord your God will choose
To that place you must go
